00012 bool MovingObjects::init()
00013 {
00014         moveFlag = true;
00015         jitterFlag = false;
00016         quad = 0;
00017 
00018            // set up pixel color blending to enable 480Hz monitor mode
00019 
00020            // set default parameters
00021            // basic target attributes
00022         if (!getParam("objType", objType))           objType = "box"; // possible types are box and circle
00023            if(!getParam( "objLen" , objLen))            objLen = 8; // diameter
00024            if(!getParam( "objVelx" , objVelx))          objVelx = 4;
00025            if(!getParam( "objVely" , objVely))              objVely = 4;
00026            if(!getParam( "objXinit" , objXinit))            objXinit = 400;
00027            if(!getParam( "objYinit" , objYinit))            objYinit = 300;
00028            if(!getParam( "targetcycle" , targetcycle))  targetcycle = 0;
00029            if(!getParam( "speedcycle" , speedcycle))    speedcycle = 0;
00030            tcyclecount = 0;
00031            objLen_o = objLen;
00032            objVelx_o = objVelx;
00033            objVely_o = objVely;
00034 
00035            // units for target info; 0=pixels, 1=degrees (1=> convert to pixels via mon_*_cm info)
00036            if(!getParam( "objUnits" , objUnits))            objUnits = 0;
00037            if(!getParam( "objcolor" , objcolor))            objcolor = 0;
00038            if(!getParam( "bgcolor" , bgcolor))              bgcolor = 1.;
00039            glClearColor(bgcolor,bgcolor,bgcolor,1.0);
00040            glColor4f(bgcolor,bgcolor,bgcolor,1.0);
00041 
00042            // use these for setting angular size and speed
00043            if(!getParam( "mon_x_cm" , mon_x_cm))            mon_x_cm = 24.2f;
00044            if(!getParam( "mon_x_pix" , mon_x_pix))          mon_x_pix = width();
00045            if(!getParam( "mon_y_cm" , mon_y_cm))            mon_y_cm = 18.2f;
00046            if(!getParam( "mon_y_pix" , mon_y_pix))          mon_y_pix = height();
00047            if(!getParam( "mon_z_cm" , mon_z_cm))            mon_z_cm = 12;
00048 
00049            // trajectory stuff
00050            if(!getParam( "rndtrial" , rndtrial))            rndtrial = 0;
00051                       // rndtrial=0 -> repeat traj every tframes; 
00052                       // rndtrial=1 new start point and speed every tframes; start=rnd(mon_x_pix,mon_y_pix); speed= +-objVelx, objVely
00053            if(!getParam( "rseed" , rseed))              rseed = -1;  //set start point of rnd seed;
00054         ran1Gen.reseed(rseed);
00055            if(!getParam( "tframes" , tframes))          tframes = 120*60*60*10; // 120fps*s
00056            if(!getParam( "delay" , delay))               delay = 0;  // delay from start of tr to stim onset;
00057            if(!getParam( "traj_data_path" , traj_data_path)) traj_data_path = "";
00058            //loadALdata(traj_data_path);
00059 
00060            if(!getParam( "jitterlocal" , jitterlocal))  jitterlocal = false;
00061            if(!getParam( "jittermag" , jittermag))          jittermag = 2;
00062 
00063            // frametrack box info
00064            if(!getParam( "ftrackbox_x" , ftrackbox_x))  ftrackbox_x = 0;
00065            if(!getParam( "ftrackbox_y" , ftrackbox_y))  ftrackbox_y = 10;
00066            if(!getParam( "ftrackbox_w" , ftrackbox_w))  ftrackbox_w = 40;
00067            if(!getParam( "ftrackbox_c" , ftrackbox_c))  ftrackbox_c = ceil(1 - bgcolor);
00068 
00069            // this increases the frame rate by encoding each RGB as 3 separate frames
00070            // generallty used w/ DLP projector w/ removed color wheel, in which case
00071            // native FPS increases by 4x (since color wheel has 4-segments/frame, RGB-W)
00072            // (make sure W set to all black or all white on projector)
00073            if(!getParam( "quad_fps" , quad_fps)) quad_fps = true;
00074 
00075            // set up blending to allow individual RGB target motion frame control
00076            // blending factor depends on bgcolor...
00077            //NOTE: this may only be correct for bgcolor = [0 or 1].
00078            /*if (quad_fps) {
00079             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00080             if (bgcolor >  0.5)
00081                 glBlendFunc(GL_DST_COLOR,GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR);
00082             else glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_COLOR,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR);
00083         }*/
00084         initDisplayLists();
00085         return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void MovingObjects::initDisplayLists()
00089 {
00090     objDL = glGenLists(1);
00091     glNewList(objDL, GL_COMPILE);
00092     QString ot = objType.toLower();
00093     
00094     if (ot == "circle" || ot == "disk" || ot == "sphere") {
00095         if (ot == "sphere") 
00096             Warning() << "Sphere not (yet) supported, defaulting to disk..";
00097         Log() << "Creating disk object..";
00098         quad = gluNewQuadric();
00099         gluDisk(quad, 0, objLen, 128, 1);
00100     }  else { // default to box object
00101         if (ot != "box") 
00102             Warning() << "Specified objType `" << ot << "' not valid, defaulting to 'box'.";
00103         Log() << "Creating box object..";
00104         glRecti( 0, 0, static_cast<int>(objLen), static_cast<int>(objLen) );
00105     }
00106     glEndList();
00107 }
00108 
00109 void MovingObjects::cleanupDisplayLists()
00110 {
00111     glDeleteLists(objDL, 1);
00112     objDL = 0xffffffff;
00113     if (quad) gluDeleteQuadric(quad), quad = 0;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void MovingObjects::cleanup()
00117 {
00118     //glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00119     cleanupDisplayLists();
00120 }
00121 
00122 bool MovingObjects::processKey(int key)
00123 {
00124     switch ( key ) {
00125     case 'm':
00126     case 'M':
00127         moveFlag = !moveFlag;
00128         return true;
00129     case 'j':
00130     case 'J':
00131         jitterFlag = !jitterFlag;
00132         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00133         glLoadIdentity();
00134         return true;
00135     }
00136     return StimPlugin::processKey(key);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void MovingObjects::drawFrame()
00140 {
00141            int framestate = (frameNum%2 == 0);
00142            
00143            // set bg
00144            //glColor3f(bgcolor,bgcolor,bgcolor);
00145            //glRecti(0,0,mon_x_pix,mon_y_pix);
00146         // for some reason glClearColor() goes way, FIXME -- for now workaround is to re-set it each frame, which is OK since this plugin is lightweight! 
00147         glClearColor(bgcolor, bgcolor, bgcolor, 1.0);
00148            glClear( GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT ); 
00149 
00150            // local target jitter
00151            if (jitterlocal) {
00152                       jitterx = (ran1Gen()*jittermag - jittermag/2);
00153                       jittery = (ran1Gen()*jittermag - jittermag/2);
00154            }
00155            else jitterx = jittery = 0;
00156         
00157         if (quad_fps) {
00158             glEnable(GL_BLEND);
00159             if (bgcolor >  0.5)
00160                 glBlendFunc(GL_DST_COLOR,GL_ONE_MINUS_DST_COLOR);
00161             else glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_COLOR,GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_COLOR);
00162         }
00163 
00164            for (int k=0; k<(quad_fps ? 3:1); k++) {
00165             if( moveFlag ){
00166                                  
00167                 // adjust for wall bounce
00168                 if ((x + vx + jitterx > mon_x_pix) ||  (x + vx + jitterx < 0)) {
00169                     vx = -vx;
00170                 }
00171                 if ((y + vy + jittery > mon_y_pix) || (y + vy + jittery < 0)) {
00172                     vy = -vy; 
00173                 }
00174                 // initialize position iff k==0 and frameNum is a multiple of tframes
00175                 if ( !k && !(frameNum%tframes)) {
00176                                             
00177                     // update target size if size-series
00178                     if ((targetcycle > 0) && (frameNum > 0)) {
00179                         if (tcyclecount++ == targetcycle) {
00180                             tcyclecount = 0;
00181                             objLen = objLen_o; // if targetcycle done, reset objLen
00182                         }
00183                         else objLen = objLen*2; // double target size every tframes
00184                     }
00185                                             
00186                     if ((speedcycle > 0) && (frameNum > 0)) {
00187                         if (tcyclecount++ == speedcycle) {
00188                             tcyclecount = 0;
00189                             objVelx = objVelx_o; // if targetcycle done, reset objLen
00190                             objVely = objVely_o; // if targetcycle done, reset objLen
00191                         }
00192                         else {
00193                             objVelx = objVelx*2; // double target size every tframes
00194                             objVely = objVely*2; // double target size every tframes
00195                         }
00196                     }
00197                     // init position
00198                     if (!rndtrial) {
00199                         x = objXinit;
00200                         y = objYinit;
00201                         vx = objVelx; //ran1( seed ) * 10;
00202                         vy = objVely; //ran1( seed ) * 10;
00203                     }
00204                     else {
00205                         x = ran1Gen()*mon_x_pix;
00206                         y = ran1Gen()*mon_y_pix;
00207                         vx = ran1Gen()*objVelx*2 - objVelx;
00208                         vy = ran1Gen()*objVely*2 - objVely; 
00209                     }
00210                 }
00211 
00212                 // update position after delay period
00213                 if ((int(frameNum)%tframes - delay) > 0) { 
00214                     x += vx + jitterx;
00215                     y += vy + jittery;
00216                 }
00217             }
00218 
00219             //x = trajdata[frameNum] + jitterx;
00220             //y = trajdata[frameNum+tframes] + jittery;
00221             // draw stim if out of delay period
00222             if ((int(frameNum)%tframes - delay) >= 0) {
00223                 if (quad_fps)
00224                     glColor3f((k == 2 ? objcolor:bgcolor), (k == 1 ? objcolor:bgcolor), (k == 0 ? objcolor:bgcolor)); 
00225                 else  glColor3f(objcolor,objcolor,objcolor);
00226                 glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00227                 glPushMatrix();
00228                 glTranslatef(x, y, 1);
00229                 glCallList(objDL);
00230                 glPopMatrix();
00231             }
00232 
00233             //if (k==2) { //display 120Hz object next to 480Hz object for motion smoothness comparison
00234             //        glColor3f(objcolor,objcolor,objcolor);
00235             //        glRecti( (int)x+4*objLen, (int)y, (int)x+5*objLen, (int)y+objLen );
00236             //}
00237            }
00238 
00239            // global jitter to whole image
00240            if( jitterFlag ){
00241                       //glRotatef( 10.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0 );
00242                       glTranslatef( (int)(ran1Gen()*4 - 4/2), (int)(ran1Gen()*4 - 4/2), 0 );
00243                       }
00244 
00245            // draw frame tracking flicker box at bottom of grid
00246            if (framestate) {
00247                       glColor4f(ftrackbox_c, ftrackbox_c, ftrackbox_c, 1);
00248                       glRecti(ftrackbox_x, ftrackbox_y, ftrackbox_x+ftrackbox_w, ftrackbox_y+ftrackbox_w);
00249            }
00250         
00251         if (quad_fps) {
00252             if (bgcolor >  0.5)
00253                 glBlendFunc(GL_DST_COLOR,GL_ONE);
00254             else glBlendFunc(GL_SRC_COLOR,GL_ONE);
00255             glDisable(GL_BLEND);
00256         }
00257 
00258 }
